message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Mixed-to-cautious close. Metals/defence and select financials showed relative strength (HINDCOPPER, BEL, HAL, AUBANK, SBICARD). IT and discretionary stayed soft (COFORGE, PERSISTENT, TRENT). Renewables weak (SUZLON slipped below near-term support). Exchanges diverged: MCX reclaimed 8000 while BSE hovered at key support. Volumes were elevated in IDEA, HINDCOPPER, ASHOKLEY, SUZLON, GRSE.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "HINDCOPPER", "signal": "Momentum long watch", "reason": "Big range green day on very high volume; momentum live. Prefer strength through 331–333 with pullback hold above ~320.", "price": 328.23},
    {"symbol": "AUBANK", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Closed near day high; a clean move above 743–745 can extend trend.", "price": 741.6},
    {"symbol": "SBICARD", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Coiling just below 890; a push and hold above 890 can trigger follow-through.", "price": 887.0},
    {"symbol": "BEL", "signal": "Momentum continuation", "reason": "Strong close; watch 406.5 breakout zone with volume for continuation.", "price": 403.15},
    {"symbol": "MCX", "signal": "Bullish continuation", "reason": "Reclaimed 8000 on close; strength above 8050 keeps trend intact.", "price": 8023.0},
    {"symbol": "GRSE", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Trend strong; needs decisive move above 2745 with volume to open higher levels.", "price": 2716.9},
    {"symbol": "HAL", "signal": "Momentum continuation", "reason": "Defence strength; follow-through above ~4825 would support new highs.", "price": 4775.2},
    {"symbol": "POLICYBZR", "signal": "Reversal confirmation", "reason": "Closed back above ~1750 pivot; sustained strength toward 1772–1780 confirms reversal.", "price": 1751.2},
    {"symbol": "JINDALSTEL", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Constructive close; 1069–1070 remains the trigger for momentum expansion.", "price": 1051.7},
    {"symbol": "ASHOKLEY", "signal": "Pullback buy watch", "reason": "Pulled back to 140–141 support zone; need reclaim of 142.5+ with improving volume.", "price": 140.45},
    {"symbol": "BSE", "signal": "Buy-the-dip watch", "reason": "Hovering near 2040–2060 support; constructive only if it bases back above 2085–2090.", "price": 2043.3},
    {"symbol": "SUZLON", "signal": "Avoid/needs reclaim", "reason": "Lost 57.3 support; consider only on reclaim >58.5/60 with volume.", "price": 56.64}
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 25000.0,
    "total_value": 25000.0,
    "holdings_count": 0,
    "holdings": []
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "Sector tone: Metals/copper and defence led (HINDCOPPER, BEL, HAL, GRSE). IT and discretionary weak (COFORGE, PERSISTENT, TRENT). Renewables soft (SUZLON, INOXWIND); utilities mixed (NTPCGREEN stable). Exchanges diverged: MCX firm >8000; BSE at support.",
    "Key Monday triggers: HINDCOPPER > 331–333; AUBANK > 745; SBICARD > 890; BEL > 406.5; JINDALSTEL > 1070; GRSE > 2745; MCX hold > 8000/8050; POLICYBZR hold > 1750; ASHOKLEY reclaim > 142.5; BSE base > 2085–2090; SUZLON reclaim > 58.5/60.",
    "Liquidity/₹25k fit: Prefer 1–2 liquid, sub-₹1,000 names (ASHOKLEY, HINDCOPPER, BEL, SBICARD [small size], AUBANK). Avoid high-ticket entries (KAYNES, AMBER, PAGEIND); MCX only if willing to take a 1-share test with tight risk.",
    "Risk plan for next week: risk ~1% of portfolio per trade (~₹250). Use stops ~2–3% below entry or below last swing low. Avoid chasing gap-ups; prefer breakout-and-retest or reversal off defined support with uptick in volume.",
    "Avoid/weak list until repair: TRENT (needs >4925), SUZLON (below support), COFORGE/MPHASIS/PERSISTENT (weak IT tape), JUBLFOOD (lost 632), hospital/diagnostics (NH, LALPATHLAB) unless reversal triggers appear.",
    "Volume cues to respect: Very high turnover in IDEA, HINDCOPPER, SUZLON, ASHOKLEY, GRSE—use these as confirmation on trigger days.",
    "Execution notes: If triggers gap above levels, wait 15–30 minutes for a retest or inside consolidation. If opening at support, require clear reversal candle plus rising intraday volume.",
    "No trades executed today; weekend focus is to finalize 1–2 starter positions contingent on Monday triggers and market tone."
  ]
}
